articles.title: Rwanda Sends Humanitarian Aid to Mozambique After Severe Floods
articles.summary: The government of Rwanda has dispatched 20 metric tons of food, medicines and emergency supplies to Mozambique, providing urgent relief to people affected by recent severe floods. ALSO READ: Over 150,000 displaced by Mozambique floods The deluge that submerged 45,000 hectares of crops and displaced more than 150,000 people has also caused widespread damage to infrastructure. articles.title: Nigeria : WHO Seeks $1bn for World Worst Health Crises in 2026
articles.summary: The World Health Organisation on Tuesday appealed for $1 billion to tackle health crises this year across the world's 36 most severe emergencies, including in Gaza, Sudan, Haiti and the Democratic Republic of Congo. The UN health agency estimated 239 million people would need urgent humanitarian assistance this year, and the money would keep essential health services going.
